allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root dicom_viewer_v2_production -e "UPDATE gdrive_backup_config SET backup_schedule = ''hourly'' WHERE id = 1;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root dicom_viewer_v2_production -e "UPDATE gdrive_backup_config SET backup_schedule = ''daily'' WHERE id = 1; SELECT backup_schedule FROM gdrive_backup_config WHERE id = 1;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root dicom_viewer_v2_production -e "ALTER TABLE gdrive_backup_config MODIFY COLUMN backup_schedule ENUM(''hourly'',''daily'',''weekly'',''monthly'') DEFAULT ''daily'';")
